Duplicate of [Bug 40834] and [Bug 38909].  What vm are you using?  If you 
disable the jit do you still get the problem?

Here is what the .log says:
!SESSION Jul 14, 2003 14:56:39.484 ---------------------------------------------
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.3.1 IBM Windows 32 build cn131-20020403 (JIT enabled: 
jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data D:\eclipse-
head\workspace -dev bin -update -install file:D:/eclipse-head/eclipse/

Why has this started to happen just recently? Is that new code or recent code 
changes?

I'm using a different setup right now (for RCP work) so I won't be able to test 
the no JIT option for a while.

I have not made any changes to the coolbar for many months.  The problem could 
be related to compiler changes.  The vm you are using is pretty old.  I have 
upgraded to the 0723 build and will see if I see the problem.  I was seeing the 
problem when I was using an old IBM vm (see 38909 for more information).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38909 ***
